doc.field: One black leather ledger of checks (1929-1934), tax receipts of JLR (1897-1912), tax bills of JLR (1910), bank receipts of JLR (1929-1931), loss of stocks and bonds (1909-1913), documents relating to Riker Homestead Estates (1918-1932), East 57th St and Sea Bright property (1939-1943), lease document (1904-1942), Chesterdonack Realty Inc. (1938-1946), taxes of MJR (1917), and receipts of account of administrators of will of MJR (1937-1939)
